channel.title: The end of seasons
channel.description:
TV show seasons that is.
That right we've come back to this time of year where our shows have and are about to end.
and we stand on the brink of of boredom
All of the good shows that have wrapped up this year, namely battlestar galactica
[url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ka_sHy9cVH0&feature=related[/url]
But the saga of the end of mankind is not over, for the birth of Caprica, that will share the beginning of the story, while although we have seen the end of the story.
The end of Heroes Season 3 had came and went, what was once was a great show with great potential, ended in a crapfest of a 2nd season and 3rd half of season 3, we shall never forgive this, let the show die in peace.
And now Fringe is about too end with the shadowy figure William Bell to reveled (although I know who's playing him)
[url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_f9a2RQNY9o[/url]
Lost also end's and how the hell its going to end is anyone's guess
[url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=R97E1C0fVUc&feature=channel_page[/url]
Dollhouse has ended, and they gave the fans who Alpha was, and if you were a fan of firefly, you'd enjoy this.
This is all I can give to this thread, share of the ends of your shows to the thread, for it just and wise to do so.

item.title: The end of seasons
item.dc:creator: The_Reverend
item.description:
TheeGoatPig:

That is probably because the Terminator in T3 was a TX, not a T1000.

:rolleyes:

Etc…

item.title: The end of seasons
item.dc:creator: TheeGoatPig
item.description:
The Reverend:

Well, they can bring her back to life like they bring any terminator back I suppose. The T1000 for instance in T2 wasn’t the same T1000 in T3. Perhaps that’s what they’ll do.

That is probably because the Terminator in T3 was a TX, not a T1000.

Read full topic

Prison Break deserved to die, along with invasion.

Thriller knock off of lost, that’s all they are! bah humbug!

item.title: The end of seasons
item.dc:creator: The_Reverend
item.description:
Raminator:

My rage will know no bounds if the series is cancelled before they are able to somehow magically bring Cameron back to life.

Goodnight, sweet princess. ;___;

Well, they can bring her back to life like they bring any terminator back I suppose. The T1000 for instance in T2 wasn’t the same T1000 in T3. Perhaps that’s what they’ll do.

Read full topic

item.title: The end of seasons
item.dc:creator: MasterHyperActive
item.description:
lol i didn’t see this thread , i posted in" What TV shows are you following?" lolol
https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showpost.php?p=8376&postcount=5

yes House and Lost season finales were amazing mindtwisting and gave us evil cliffhangers.
can’t wait for Prison Break tmorrow.
24 and NCIS season finale next week.

Read full topic

item.title: The end of seasons
item.dc:creator: Grand_General_Hot
item.description:
Well fringe ended there

Was a decent episode imo, as he bald man said, there is more than one of everything, so Mister Jones isn’t dead in other universes.

Also season 2 teaser

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ub05X_ikLZE&feature=channel_page

item.title: The end of seasons
item.dc:creator: Alcator
item.description:
Edit: I Just discovered that Prison Break will actually end 2 weeks later with 2 special epizodes that will conclude the series. Only Sky One should broadcast them on 26th of May, but I guess the InterWebs will make sure we all see them

item.title: The end of seasons
item.dc:creator: Alcator
item.description:
Nobody mentions Prison Break SERIES finale this friday. The last 2 episodes better be VERY VERY GOOD (with the dilemma presented at the end of last episode, they should be…)

Read full topic

item.title: The end of seasons
item.dc:creator: Winged_One
item.description:
Shit, the House twist tonight was epic. Really gave me quite the mind fuck the way [COLOR=‘White’]he imagined detoxing and sleeping with Cuddy. I’m wondering if he’s going to the mental hospital to detox or if he really does have some serious mental condition.

Read full topic

item.title: The end of seasons

item.description:
if they don’t get a 3rd season, they’ll make a TV movie.

TV studio’s allow shows to wrap up these days.

item.title: The end of seasons
item.dc:creator: InterloperX
item.description:
io9.com did a great break down of the shows we’re losing soon. Sarah Connor Chronicles fate is still in the air, but I never really got into that one.

Here’s the link to the article:

https://io9.com/5248365/say-goodbye-to-lost-fringe-smallville-and-supernatural?skyline=true&s=x

Read full topic

item.title: The end of seasons
item.dc:creator: Dias
item.description:
Grand_General_Hot:

And now Fringe is about too end with the shadowy figure William Bell to reveled (although I know who’s playing him)

At first I thought it was cool that he was going to play Bell, but with the excessive amount of Star Trek adds I’ve been seeing, as well as the amount of stuff referenced in the show, I’m kinda getting sick of it.

Read full topic

item.title: The end of seasons
item.dc:creator: Chris
item.description:
[align=left]I hate when a season of Lost ends. Also got 24 ending this month, and Scrubs just finished too. Hopefully Scrubs won’t come back though, it won’t be as good without Zach Braff.[/align]

Read full topic
